name: Otter.ai
description: Otter.ai provides AI-powered transcription and meeting assistant tools to enhance productivity in meetings and note-taking.
longDescription: Otter.ai is an AI-driven transcription and meeting management platform designed to streamline note-taking, collaboration, and productivity for professionals, students, and teams. Founded in 2016 as AISense, it converts spoken conversations into searchable, editable text in real-time or from recordings, solving the challenge of capturing and organizing critical meeting details. The platform integrates with tools like Zoom, Google Meet, and Slack, making it ideal for virtual and in-person settings. Its mission is to empower users to focus on discussions by automating tedious tasks like transcribing and summarizing, while features like OtterPilot enhance meeting efficiency. Otter.ai serves diverse users, from business teams to educators, by providing accessible, accurate, and collaborative transcription solutions.
features: Real-time transcription converts spoken words into text instantly, enabling users to follow and review discussions effortlessly.
OtterPilot automatically joins virtual meetings, records audio, captures slides, and generates live notes, saving time for attendees.
Automated summaries highlight key points, decisions, and action items, providing concise recaps for quick reference.
Speaker identification labels different speakers in transcripts, improving clarity and ease of navigation in multi-participant meetings.
Custom vocabulary allows users to add industry-specific terms or jargon, enhancing transcription accuracy for specialized contexts.
Seamless integrations with Zoom, Google Meet, Microsoft Teams, and Slack streamline workflow and note-sharing across platforms.
AI Chat enables users to query transcripts for specific details, simplifying the retrieval of information from past meetings.
Searchable transcripts make it easy to locate keywords or phrases, ensuring no critical details are missed.

faqs.question: What is Otter.ai used for?
faqs.answer: Otter.ai is used for transcribing and summarizing meetings, lectures, and interviews in real-time or from recordings, enhancing productivity and collaboration.

faqs.question: Does Otter.ai offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, Otter.ai provides a free Basic plan with 300 monthly transcription minutes and 30-minute session limits, suitable for casual users.

faqs.question: How accurate is Otter.ai’s transcription?
faqs.answer: Otter.ai claims 85% accuracy, though performance may vary with audio quality, accents, or background noise, requiring occasional manual edits.

faqs.question: Can Otter.ai integrate with other tools?
faqs.answer: Otter.ai integrates with Zoom, Google Meet, Microsoft Teams, Slack, and over 7,000 apps via Zapier for seamless workflow management.

faqs.question: Is Otter.ai secure for sensitive meetings?
faqs.answer: Otter.ai uses AWS S3 storage with server-side encryption, but users should review its privacy policy as it doesn’t guarantee complete data security.

faqs.question: Does Otter.ai support multiple languages?
faqs.answer: Otter.ai currently supports only English (UK and US), limiting its use for multilingual meetings.

faqs.question: Can Otter.ai transcribe pre-recorded audio?
faqs.answer: Yes, users can upload audio or video files for transcription, making it versatile for interviews, podcasts, or archived content.

faqs.question: What is OtterPilot?
faqs.answer: OtterPilot is an AI meeting assistant that auto-joins virtual meetings, transcribes discussions, and generates summaries and action items.
